thread.title: Delhi cold wave: Visibility drops to zero as IMD issues orange alert amid foggy weather
thread.title_full: Delhi cold wave: Visibility drops to zero as IMD issues orange alert amid foggy weather

author: Sheenu Sharma
title: Delhi cold wave: Visibility drops to zero as IMD issues orange alert amid foggy weather
text: Fog engulfs India Gate, Kartavya Path during a cold winter morning in New Delhi. Vehicles move on a road amid morning fog in New Delhi. Several trains delayed at New Delhi railway station due to fog as cold waves grips national capital. Pedestrians cross railway tracks amid morning fog in Delhi. Vehicles move on the road amid low visibility on a foggy winter morning in Delhi. Fog engulfs buildings at Connaught Place amid fog in New Delhi. Visibility affected as a thick blanket of fog descended over Delhi's AIIMS and Safdarjung areas.
